subject: Learning
title: Montessori: Follow the Child
description: A short lesson to help you apply Montessori: Follow the Child.

hook.text: Maria Montessori gave slum children in Rome beautiful materials and freedom to choose. They thrived.

buildup.text: The Montessori method lets children direct their own learning within a prepared environment.

discovery.text: Mixed-age classrooms, self-paced work, and sensory materials replaced lectures and textbooks.

twist.text: Montessori was dismissed by academics for decades. Now, Amazon, Google, and Wikipedia founders credit it.

climax.text: Research shows Montessori students develop stronger executive function and intrinsic motivation.

punchline.text: Trust the child's curiosity. It knows where to go.

quiz.question: What is the core principle of Montessori education?
options: Children direct their own learning in a prepared environment
Teachers dictate every activity throughout the day
Only gifted children benefit from the method
